parametrized_description: A restaurant offers two types of meals: Original and Experimental. The Original meal generates OriginalFoodWaste units of food waste and OriginalWrappingWaste units of wrapping waste, and requires OriginalCookingTime minutes to prepare. The Experimental meal generates ExperimentalFoodWaste units of food waste and ExperimentalWrappingWaste units of wrapping waste, and requires ExperimentalCookingTime minutes to prepare. The total wrapping waste must not exceed MaxWrappingWaste, and the total food waste must not exceed MaxFoodWaste. Determine the number of Original and Experimental meals to minimize the total cooking time.

OriginalFoodWaste.description: Food waste generated by the original meal

OriginalWrappingWaste.description: Wrapping waste generated by the original meal

OriginalCookingTime.description: Cooking time for the original meal

ExperimentalFoodWaste.description: Food waste generated by the experimental meal

ExperimentalWrappingWaste.description: Wrapping waste generated by the experimental meal

ExperimentalCookingTime.description: Cooking time for the experimental meal

constraints.description: The total wrapping waste generated by Original and Experimental meals must not exceed MaxWrappingWaste.
The total food waste generated by Original and Experimental meals must not exceed MaxFoodWaste.

objective.description: The total cooking time is the sum of the cooking times required for Original and Experimental meals. The objective is to minimize the total cooking time.
